name: The Elder Tales
description: Prepare for a challenging adventure in this oldschool 2D action-RPG. Experience the nostalgic charm of retro graphics combined with modern gameplay solutions. With low computer requirements, immerse yourself in an intriguing story and explore a world filled with endless activities.

name: The Adventures of Liam

Explore the post-apocalyptic world of Copperfields, discover what happened to the human and robot civilizations, and find your new home.

name: Unity
description: Initially announced for the Gamecube in early 2003, the game was cancelled in December 2004. Inability to meet its ambition and scope within a realistic timeframe was cited as a reason by developer Peter Molyneux.

The game was never released, but some aspects were reworked into concepts used for the Wii's Mii and Wii Sports years later.

name: MetaForce
description: The game mostly consisted of concept artwork, design documents, and a mock up engine for a third-person game that was reworked into a first-person game due to pressure from Nintendo and Retro executives. This game was eventually cancelled, but apparently inspired Shigeru Miyamoto to hand Retro the Metroid license, thereby moving the development team to produce Metroid Prime instead.

description: The game designers initially wanted to make a Mario Football game, but Nintendo settled on a realistic simulator with the NFL license due to Retro's purpose of creating mature games. The game was canceled in February 2001.

name: Iceman

Announced as a local multiplayer game for the Gamecube, PS2, original Xbox, and Windows, the game progressed to about 80% completed, but was cancelled when Datura couldn't find a publisher and went out of business.

name: Game Zero
description: A game announced announced by Zoonami, a company started by ex-Rare employee Martin Hollis, but never released in any capacity, and the company went out of business in the late 2000s.

name: Long Nardy
description:
Nard refers to both intellectual games and gambling, which allows you to combine "business with pleasure", while giving the player the opportunity to show logic and feel the triumph of victory. In our case, we are talking about the game Long Nardy, since no other game will allow you to get so much adrenaline.
When playing Long Nardy, you will have to "work your head" well, because in order to play Long Nardy, you need ingenuity, tactical thinking, the ability to see the game one move ahead.

name: Survival RPG 4: Haunted Manor
description:
A ghost, a haunted house, an epic quest adventure you won't forget! Survival RPG 4: Haunted Manor is the 4th game of the 2D retro Survival RPG (Role playing game) adventure series. The story begins with the disappearance of your magical artefact. Your quest is to find it by exploring the ghost haunted manor and its surroundings.
To solve the mystery, you will have to explore a haunted house, lost temples and other dungeons, fight ghosts, discover hidden objects and treasures and unlock puzzles. Find out who is behind the mystery of the Survival RPG series, from the stranger who was asking for your help to the villain messing with the timeline.

name: Rapz
description: Rapz! is about a young girl, Rapulani, with a magical afro who must endure many great obstacles and a gauntlet of an adventure with her magical hair, just to get through the day. You must help Rapulani navigate her complicated 5 year old life and her wild hair as she tries to get through the day in order to make it to a friends‚Äô birthday party. Good luck!

It seems that the project was based on the film with the same name from Columbia Pictures, in which 2 young brothers escape their chaotic family life with dreams of flying. Inspired by a local legend, they attempt to build a working airplane from their ordinary red wagon.

description: Embark on an 8-bit style JRPG quest to save Earth. Battle in unique party-based combat mixing real-time action and strategic commands. Join Gio and a team of lively characters as they unearth bizarre global events, forgotten legends, and battle mythical foes to unveil the secrets of Geo Mythica.

name: Brimstone
description: Sensible Software is a studio embedded in gaming history for many reasons outside of the admittedly immortal Sensible Soccer. Along with the Canon Fodder games ‚Äì the destructive sibling of Sensible's popular football sim ‚Äì the company's commitment to the 16-bit Amiga proved that, sometimes, you can achieve impossibly addictive gaming perfection even with the most cartoon-like of visuals. Make a game addictive, and if it's being played by enough people, you've succeeded ‚Äì and the fame of Sensible's output during the '90s suggests that it was something of a triumph.

The game was planned to use pre-rendered 3D graphics on the 16-Bit console, somehow similar to what Rare also did with their Donkey Kong Country series. While Venom Spirit was never officially announced by the company, many details about the project were shared online by John and Ste Pickford.

The game was a sequel / remake of the original Airborne Ranger released in 1987 / 1988 for Amiga and various PCs. As the original version, we would have play as a sole airborne military to infiltrate enemy territory to complete various objectives. It‚Äôs currently unknown if the SNES version was going to use the same level system as the original game, that created maps and objective locations randomly so missions were never the same.

name: Tricky Gems
description:
The point of this game is to match a line or diagonal of three or more gems, using columns of three pieces falling into the playing field and to get as much points as possible. At the end of each level, a column of bomb blocks appear and whatever color gem it touches, all of them disappear. This special column also appears when you press the bomb button that is available after the Power-up Bar is filled up. The background changes between levels and the columns move gradually faster. If you lose the game the playing field will be filled in with exploding bombs.

Test how good you really are and try to get all of the 23 Achievements. Some of them require real master control over the game. You need quick thinking, fast reflexes and good game strategy in order to score enough points to become "Gem Legend".

name: RookStar
description:
You control five rooks that move in straight lines until they hit a wall or another rook.
For each problem, try to move the rook with the same color as the target to the target position (rotating star) in as few moves as possible. Play with friends or compete against others in the daily challenges.

name: Symbol Link

Solve puzzles pairing up matching symbols with a single path.
Team up with your iPhone or iPad artificial intelligence to score points by drawing autolinks ‚Äì two symbols automatically connected when definite path between them exists.

"ZomBehead!" is a variation of clicker games, it features 18 non-stop crazy levels, funny characters, bonuses and surprises, a cool story line and original mechanics not seen in other clickers.
You must have good concentration and fast reflexes.
The name of the game ZomBehead! is a combination of Behead and Zombie (Behead the Zombie!). Said aloud, it sounds like Zombie Head.

name: Ship Smash

Wanna Smash?
Ship Smash is a unique, fast-paced, tower defense style, action game that requires quick and accurate fingers but timing and strategy as well. Use the octopus's arms and ink to smash and blast the enemy ships before they bring your health to zero. Along the way, you'll encounter new ships with different speeds, health and attack styles. Beat levels to unlock new zones, each with their own unique location and hazard. Earn stars and complete unique challenges to unlock fun costumes. Can you earn all 180 stars?

description: A FPS modern time game.

name: Fall of the Son
description: Fall Of The Son is a roguelike deckbuilder. Assemble powerful strategies to battle through hordes of enemies - with 3 playable characters and over 200 unique cards at your disposal. Do you have the grit and determination to make it to the end and face off against The Son?

name: Aatral
description: In ancient India, King Vallaan ventures to an infected Eng Empire to rescue his queen, Alli. Evil powers and creatures control the land. Can Vallaan overcome the darkness and save his beloved, or will they both succumb to the sinister forces?

name: Oil Filling
description: Your job is to refuel and manage gas stations. One day, a zombie apocalypse happened. Zombies are coming, you have to deal with this!

name: Baby's Day Out
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Golf Tour
description: Golf Tour is a full-featured 3D golf simulation featuring and entertaining single mode. Golf Tour 3D delivers all the elements of a golf game you would expect including a customizable set of golf clubs, a range of match and stroke play competitions, male and female golfer graphics and a range of golfer abilities.

name: Blood Rush
description: Blood Rush is a fast paced roguelite skill based fps, upgrade yourself, get new abilities, get new guns, upgrade them and find synergies to destroy anyone or anything standing on your way to escape a Dante inspired Hell!

name: Sleep: H Now
description: A game in which you can learn Linux commands while playing around.

name: Zombie Rollerz: The Last Ship
description: The Last Ship Take command of the last ship in a zombie-filled world and defend against endless waves of the undead. Build turrets, lead your crew, and upgrade the ship while gathering loot in this exciting "Tower Defense-on-wheels zombie survival roguelite" game.

name: Fistagon
description:
Compete in the futuristic Fistagon-tournament against the best atheletes in the world!
Play in multiplayer to crush other fisters around the world or in single player to top the global leaderboards. Fistagon is a game that's easy to learn, but hard to master.

name: Cards of Destiny
description: Cards of Destiny is a VR puzzle game that brings the tabletop experience to a unique interactive environment! Turn your inner child into a god as you draw one-time-use cards that can save or condemn the tiny humans on your desk ‚Äì and the aliens chasing them. Adapt to different levels and situations as your randomized deck, ticking clock and looming alien threats all keep you on your feet!

name: Tic Tac Toe: Speed Tapping
description:
Tic-tac-toe in a game of speed!
The one with the fastest tap and the smartest brain wins!

name: StickSpinner
description: "Challenging Action" meets "Party Game" for up to four players! Introducing our latest game where players navigate using rotating sticks and control their jumps based on stick angles. The unique feature that sets this game apart is the "Jump" mechanic, which also presents its greatest challenge.

name: One Perfect Day
description:
One Perfect Day is a game that explores the topics of abuse and self-compassion. Encompassed in a first person puzzle adventure where players attempt to escape a time loop by solving non-linears puzzles in separate time periods with the use of chronological sequencing itself.

Explore Andy's alma matter and make use of a series of tools and memorabilia to help Andy discover the things that happened or could have happened and help him find his way to the truth of his past.

name: Fake Emperors
description: This game has more than 5 heroes and you switch between them. A comic story in a classic animation style. With more than 8000 hand-drawing animation frames. An adventure point & click game with many cut-scene animations. If you like cartoons nostalgia this is for you.

name: Awakening
description: Awakening is a first person experimental puzzle game with a unique gameplay based on pattern recognition. Guide a soul that decided to find meaning by solving puzzle machines with videos. Use inductive reasoning to discover the challenges while exploring an oneiric environment.

name: Immune Simulator
description: Immune Simulator is a strategy-adventure game.

name: Exit Veil
description:
In Exit Veil, players are cast in the role of Tori, a lost soul navigating her way through a beautiful and terrible world on the brink of decay.
Collect tarot cards and use them in tense MMO healer class-inspired turn-based battles, where you are always moments away from oblivion. Forever on the back foot you‚Äôll have to test your resolve to snatch victory from the jaws of certain defeat.

name: Boosted
description: This work is equipped with a "lead walk system" in which the story develops according to the passage of time and the distance traveled! The real world and the game work together to solve mysteries by waiting for time to pass, moving with your character, and making important choices. Aim to clear the game by squeezing the functions and wisdom of Apple Watch!

name: Dead Flamingo
description: Dead Flamingo is an action-adventure fantasy game that follows the epic story of a young fisherman driven by hopeful ideals in an insidious world that meets its end every seven days.

name: Descend
description: Descend is a VR multiplayer shooter set in a vast Cyberpunk universe. Use special abilities with unique skins, manual reloading features, an extensive loadout system and a collection of unique weapons to secure the objective!

name: Kingdom's Gambit
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating narrative of Kingdom's Gambit an enthralling turn-based puzzle RPG that plunges you into a meticulously crafted levels. Lead a band of heroes in an epic journey of strategic battles and intricate puzzles.

name: Zone Trip
description: Dance like you are the music, like the world is your dancefloor and you are the world. Become a VR creator by making your own "zones", make content by recording the awesome visuals that you shake out to the beat, or just enjoy the best of the best.

name: Alter
description: Humanity is almost extinct and only one fortress remain : Bastion. Defended since centuries by mutated humans called Alter, it may not withstand the upcoming internal and external threats. Help Mavenna change this corrupted society for something better... or worst, it's up to you.

name: Lust Kingdom
description: Lust Kingdom is a free-to-play hentai RPG with dating sim elements, in which you become the heir to a kingdom! Build relationships, have sex with concubines, gather your army, and conquer new lands to make the Lust Kingdom great again!

name: Order Us!
description: Stay for a spell in an alluring caf√©, where orders hold a deeper flavor than meets the eye, and waitresses serve more than just drinks! Find out what goes on under the table in this vintage-inspired visual novel brought to life with Live2D animation!

name: The Keyboard
description: This is a text based game. You need to use the given keyboard to achieve the level goal.

name: Shapeguard
description: Shapeguard is a 2D top-down interactivity driven puzzle game where you move on a grid, inside a temple, and collect different shapes to solve puzzles. Will you manage to use the machines, walls and doors to your advantage to escape from the temple?

name: Battle Records of Rota
description: Battle Records of Rota is a straightforward action shooting RPG game, mainly for players who like anime and action shooting games. Players will play Luota, a girl warrior, to help the little prince defeat the witch and regain the throne.

name: Harrowed World: Portents In Red
description: Get ready to unleash your inner vampire! Harrowed World: Portents In Red is a single player RPG video game. As a newly turned vampire, you'll discover the intricate web of power struggles and deadly rivalries that govern vampire society, where danger is everywhere, and trust is a rare commodity.

name: Death Life: Beyond Purgatory
description: Humanity has lost its war against the virus, a world where balance and order have been disrupted. A unit unaffected by the virus, dedicated to aiding humanity, has emerged. A courier whose path leads to New State. Will you be able to complete the delivery in the face of the challenges ahead?

name: DoudingMan
description: This is a defensive shooter Roguelite game where enemies will be coming from the right side in an endless stream and you need to survive for a limited time to get through. If you can keep the goods on the left intact, all the better.

name: Shopping Match
description:
Looking for a different type of memory match game? Well look no further.
Welcome to Shopping Match by Deanavryn Studios.
Shopping Match is a memory match game with a difference.
First you need to select grocery items to place on your shopping list. Once your list is complete it‚Äôs time to go shopping.
Each player needs to find all the items on their shopping list by turning over cards one at a time. Make a match, pick again! No match, the card turns back over.
The first player to find all their grocery items wins.
You can choose from 16, 24 or 36 cards.
You can play with one or two players.
Happy Shopping!
All Deanavryn Studio Apps are child friendly.

name: Dinosaur Assassin: I-Evolution
description:
‚ÄãOn your Dinosaur Assassin journey you‚Äôll require a host of weapons and a variety of ways to travel through this dangerous world.
You can build up your weapons to include: Pistol Crossbow(Explosive Arrows), Compound Bow, Proximity Mines/Gas Canisters, Handgun, Rifle.

name: Election Year Knockout: Boxing
description: Create your own political party, lace up your boxing gloves, and punch your way to the White House in Election Year Knockout! In a country torn apart by its political divide, the nation has resorted to boxing to settle its differences. Fight your way through hilarious political opponents before squaring off with president Donald Thump himself!

name: Tiny Pharaoh: Pixel Strategy
description: Tiny Pharaoh is a real-time strategy game set in Ancient Egypt. Become the master builder and turn the meadow into a city with a functional economy. Build houses, farms, mines, sawmills, and much more. Accumulate resources and achieve significant goals, such as building pyramids, the Great Sphinx, and many other famous buildings!

name: Snakes LTD VR
description: Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

name: Project K1
description: Follow Rion Karmanz`s legend to become the first human Raja Rimba in this fast paced hack-n-slash action game that is inspired by Megaman and Devil May Cry series.

name: The Pocket Arcade
description:
Enter into the golden age of arcade gaming with The Pocket Arcade. Play the biggest collection of amazingly detailed and crafted retro arcade games anywhere you want.
The Pocket Arcade is a love letter to arcade games from a bygone era, where neon-soaked, coin-operated machines were the pinnacle of interactive entertainment. From early 8-bit shooters and monochrome vector games through 16-bit puzzlers and action games, right up to early 3D games from the mid-'90s, as well as non-videogame coin-ops such as darts, pool, and table football. The Pocket Arcade is a gamer‚Äôs paradise!

name: Grandma's Kitchen
description: Cook up fun and learning in Grandma's Kitchen! Bake together some compound words, snatch healthy veggies hiding in the fridge, and use ingredients to make and decorate a cake. This dancing Grandma needs you to spot the differences between the desserts, count by tens to tally the cookies, and choose the clock that shows when your cake will be done. Plus, watch videos of real-live cooking action alongside dear ol' Grandma!

name: Fomography
description: Fomography is a story-driven adventure photography game. Play as a boy exploring his entire lifetime to rediscover and chronicle his memories. What has been forgotten that only the photos can show? What hidden memories do even the photos refuse to share?

name: Parcel Packing Simulator
description: A Cozy parcel-packing game where you use your brains to Pack parcels in as small packages as possible! Pack random orders to train yourself and try to break high scores from the order list!

name: The Tale of Lumi
description: Master tight platforming sections, collect and upgrade Godly powerups, battle powerful enemies, solve intriguing puzzles and explore the riveting world of LUMI in this fast paced 2D action game

name: HostageHub
description: Team up with friends in HostageHub, the ultimate wave-based hostage rescue experience. Fight, earn, spend, and repeat. Can you master the art of hostage rescue and financial balance?

name: Monster Home
description: This is a top down RPG. A girl named Aliosha. She inherited the bloodline of the strongest summoner and the monster farm left by her father. This game can collect various monsters, manage farms, and explore unknown worlds.

name: Wonder Wandelier
description: You're an apprentice wand maker with a dream - and a huge debt to pay off in 30 days! Manage your store, gather materials in the dungeon, and craft magic wands to sell to customers. Haggle to get the best price and build reputation as a wand maker in this casual magic wand-shop simulation RPG.

name: Hotel Clover
description: Here, there exists a secretive guest only known to me. A fusion of romance and management simulation, 'Hotel Clover'.

name: The Left Behind
description: The Left Behind is a solo and co-op post-apocalyptic survival game. Explore an overgrown open world at day time and beware of enemies coming in at night. Salvage, hunt and build your way through this world to survive. How long will you survive?

name: After University
description: As a desperate unemployed university graduate, your dreams seem distant until fate guides you to your uncle's worn-out doner restaurant in a new city. Dive into a world where gangsters lurk, and true love Amy reappears. Your goals are clear: Achieve Career Success, Get Married, and Earn Respect.

name: After the Storm
description: Rebuild society after the climate apocalypse! Can you keep your settlement alive? Will you hold onto your humanity or lose it in the directionless expanse?

name: Ultramassive
description: Embark on a journey towards the center of the galaxy in Ultramassive, a roguelite deckbuilder! Craft a unique deck, fight hostile aliens, gamble your way out of stick situations and and find parts to upgrade your spaceship along the way.

name: Anvil of Tristheim
description: The first card-based blacksmith crafting game! Merge material cards into items - and turn your customers into dragon slayers or dragon food.

name: Humbug Tales: Keeper of the Swarm
description: Experience the world of bugs through the eyes of the humbug ant herder Eacus and his peculiar flock. Together you'll meet a quirky cast of tiny friends on a larger-than-life adventure. Explore lush wetlands and use your wits to outsmart predators and enemy humbugs. Your colony is depending on you!

name: On Life and Living
description: In "On Life and Living", beyond metroidvania-style exploration and challenging encounters, players will also experience an emotional story of love, grief, and consequences. You are in control, shaping the course of this journey towards regeneration.

name: Hymn to the Earless God
description: Turn-based RPG from the creator of Jimmy and the Pulsating Mass set on a brutal alien planet. Four unique main characters, four unforgettable stories, four inescapable calamities.

description: ErIS: Z. Œ∏-pRogram is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Yuumitsuki and explore a virtual world via a headset.

name: Zombie Knockout
description:
There is one game simple enough for every zombie to play: knockout (also known as bump).
Their goal is to score a basket before the player behind them makes a shot. If they make a shot before the player behind them, they must go back behind the line and shoot again.
Players keep shooting until one player scores before the player in front of him/her.
Zombies take their knockout games very seriously.

name: Bloody Finger Jump
description:
Brace yourselves, Bloody Fingers are coming! Win, survive and be the best!
Your fingers will stand to a fight you can't even imagine!
Bloody Finger Jump will take you to a surreal world, where you will battle to death using your own finger.

name: Ascension X
description: Our Holy Emperor needs our aid to help rescue the innocent civilians on Earth from the evil Corporations that took over the World. The Templars will help achieve peace on an Apocalyptic Earth, help the development of Mars civilization and explore new planets in the Universe!

name: A Story in Bronze Ware
description: Welcome to Bamboo Spring Town. Revitalize your garden through farming, gathering, and manufacturing, gradually enriching your resources and resisting invasions. In the real historical environment, resist the invasion of foreigners, unite the vassals and powers for the final victory.

name: Drakantos
description: Drakantos is a free-to-play MMORPG with a nostalgic pixel art style, combined with exciting, fast-paced action combat and more than 20 unique playable heroes.

name: Echo of the Waves
description: Echo of the Waves is a poetic and atmospheric watercolor-painted exploration game where you play music to interact with nature.

name: Endless Cold Journey
description: A lightweight rogue-lite game of solo survival adventure, where players will have to gather supplies, craft weapons, and enhance their chances of survival in the face of sudden extreme cold and endless waves of corpses, all in order to return to their family.

name: EraTurn
description: EraTurn: Embark on an epic journey in this turn-based strategy game, shaping your civilization across the ages. Skillfully manage resources, advance technology, and expand through conquests, all while bearing witness to the world's evolution and transformation.

name: CruzeCraze
description: Embark on a captivating cruise ship simulation game. Sail through the challenges of running a cruise empire. Navigate stunning waters and create unforgettable experiences. Managing crew dynamics, inventory logistics, and passenger satisfaction. Become the ultimate captain of the seas!

name: Daikon Creatures
description: Fight against endless hordes of creatures in this survival roguelite in vast unexplored lands where you will find treasures, secrets and many challenges, but with great rewards.

name: Kalimour
description: Kalimour is a deep hex-based city-building strategy game where you explore hostile lands and create a vast and prosperous domain. Expand your borders, fend off hostiles and grow your land into the most prosperous kingdom in the world.

name: Knock Out Walls
description: Reign supreme in a world of walls and spells. Discover powerful strategies and outsmart your rivals with cunning tactics to rise through the ranks and become the one true Wallstar!

name: Last Warrior Arena
description: Last Warrior Arena is a roguelike strategy combat game, where you choose your class and develop your warrior by choosing stats, skills and buying and upgrading equipment. Your goal is to go as far as you can in the arena, fighting bosses in your way. Loosing to a boss will result in perma-death.

name: Legends of Mythology
description: Set forth on a journey of discovery where secrets await. Engage in methodical combat, recover items to enhance your abilities. Challenge the insurmountable and become the unexpected hero, or shun the role of the savior and embrace the mantle of the villain. Explore, adapt, triumph.

name: Glitch Moba
description: Welcome to Glitch! Suit up for explosive 5v5 MOBA battles in a vibrant sci-fi universe, customize your avatar with unique abilities, and dive into fast-paced, strategic skirmishes. Your mission, is to outwit opponents, demolish enemy firewalls, and capture their database. Gear up, it's game time!

name: Gold and Glory
description: Gold and Glory is a classic exploration game developed specifically for VR. Discover the treasures of a derelict pirate ship! Fight off the peculiar creatures that dwell in this strange and magical place! Seize your gold and glory!

name: Girlfriend = Yog-Sothoth: Cthulhu
description: Teen Romance x Comedy x Lovecraftian. This visual novel is a must-play for fans of all three genres. It features a heartwarming romance, hilarious comedy, and edge-of-your-seat thrill. With its engaging story and memorable characters, this visual novel is sure to leave you wanting more.

name: Grow Your Guarden
description: Grow a garden of powerful plants to defend The Great Tree from hordes of demonic creatures!

name: Joe Biden: Escape From MAGA
description: Joe Biden is the 46th President Of America. Every Week he has to put up with insanely funny situations as he tries to get through his term as POTUS. After you start playing this game, prepare to enjoy laughs and hi-jinx as Joe deals with Putin, Trump, Hunter, space aliens, and everyone in the world.

name: Luctus
description: "Luctus," brought to life through pixel art, delves into Nora's intricate and dramatic story. As you experience this mysterious tale, you will find yourself exploring an original world, getting to know diverse characters, and engaging in epic action moments by conjuring various flame spells!

name: Petrol Station Sim
description: Petrol Station Sim is a fun and addictive game that puts you in the shoes of a gas station attendant.

name: Pixel Washer
description: Pixel Washer is a cozy, zen-like game where you play as a cute piggy power washing beautiful pixelated worlds. Wash sprites, upgrade your power washer, and find hidden secrets.

name: PlanetSmith
description: PlanetSmith is a sandbox game set on spherical worlds, offering unique exploration and creative building. Journey into procedurally generated voxel worlds that defy the conventional limits of block building. Showcase your creativity on a spherical canvas ready for your artistic touch.

name: Our Tribe Above All
description: Immerse in an inventive online co-op horde survival, fusing 'Vampire Survivor' combat with multiplayer strategy. Build your village through earned combat experience, strategize, and decide together, accompanied by captivating hand-drawn animations.

name: Nether Spirits: Beyond the Gate
description: Mend your shattered soul in Nether Spirits, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder set in a dark, fantastical afterlife corrupted by sin. Choose from seven distinct classes, explore a vast world, and fight your way to salvation - alone, with friends, or in real-time PvP!

name: New World
description: ‚ÄúNew World‚Äù is a new survival game. Explore the world. Create your own weapons and tools. Build your own house and protect yourself from the dangers that could happen.

name: Russian Fight Simulator
description: Russian Fight Simulator is a 2-D combat simulator with many different weapons, maps and views to choose from!

name: SCP: Equestrian
description: An indie fast-paced first person shooter set in the SCP universe with an arsenal of weapons to combo with.

name: Sculpt
description: A cozy 3D puzzle game with cubes.

name: Rhino Puzzle
description: Solve different puzzles to go forward and collect all skulls in this 3d puzzle game.

name: Supercharged
description: Prepare for "Supercharged." Do Parkour, forge platforms, and climb new heights with your unique gun. Outsmart enemies, solve challenges, and shatter the boundaries of reality. Embark on a single-player odyssey, for an electrifying escape. Are you ready to wield your power?

name: Summer After Ten Years: Steam Edition
description: Akira and Misaki always played together in their childhood. One day, Misaki had to transfer to a school overseas for her parents' reasons. They meet again in the summer of 10 years later.

name: Strange Hill
description: Adventure in an open world with many mysteries and puzzles.

name: Stellar Echoes: Ultimate Challenge
description: Stellar Echoes: Ultimate Challenge is the ultimate test.Bring all your weapons, fight like crazy, and become a qualified space warrior.

name: Stellar Echoes: Maze Shooter
description: Stellar Echoes: Maze Shooter is a smart challenge, a maze adventure VR game that can be freely combined through maze gameplay.

name: Stellar Echoes: Boxing Champion
description: Stellar Echoes: Boxing Champion is a very special experience, especially for those who like sports.

name: Stellar Echoes: Brave Trial
description: Stellar Echoes: Brave Trial is a mild rogue combat shooter that also allows you to turn on Endless Mode after completing the game.

name: Spider Bounce
description: Based on a simple idea, this game takes you on a journey of colorful fly hunting. You move your spider left to right and press down to dash, it is that simple. Spider Bounce builds on this idea through a variety of mechanics including upgrades and different game modes.

name: Space Digger
description: Can You Survive While Mining In Space?Space Digger is a challenging and action-packed space mining, action roguelike game!

name: The Green Room Experiment: Episode 2
description: You're locked in a dream and you need to wake up. This game is designed on an escape game structure, you must solve a puzzle to move on to the next table. Immerse yourself into a dreamlike, strange universe, mixing exploration, mystery and poetry.

name: The Mending
description: Another threshold has been opened, and is in need of mending. It‚Äôs time to perform your duties. Weaken the demon, seal the door and send it back to Hell.

name: The Purge
description: The Purge offers you a different experience. Embark on a dark adventure to find your lost Wife Cristina in this story-based game and unravel the mystery behind the deep story. Run from place to place with many universes, enemies and mechanical styles in it and feel the purge.

name: The Arena Pit
description: Ready for a blend of RPG and Tower Defense in a 2D rogue-lite game? Enter The Arena Pit! Choose your hero, wield powerful weapons and skills. Strategize your moves in the arena, setting traps, obstacles, and towers against hordes of monsters in the epic battle of good versus evil!

name: Undercover Speed Dating (with Wolves)
description: Undercover Speed Dating (with Wolves) is a game where you flirt your way behind wolf-enemy lines. Your mission? To infiltrate wolf speed dating, pee on some fire hydrants and rescue the human they've got trapped in the kitchen.

name: Age of Tribulation
description: Age of Tribulation is a dark fantasy, dragon warrior inspired, roguelite. Explore an open world full of dangers in turn-based combat. With permadeath and a day/night cycle, study the codex and learn your enemies or meet certain death.

name: Wildkins
description: Dive into strategic battles, explore fantasy lands, and collect unique creatures. Rise as the top Wildkin trainer!

name: Velarune
description: Explore a seamless and colorful world while being hunted by a cosmic wolf in this beautiful third-person adventure game. Uncover the scarred past of Velarune by solving puzzles and collecting relics. Discover the secrets of this secluded land before time runs out‚Ä¶

name: VectorBall
description: A time-traveling, dimension-shifting, mind-bending roguelike game. Guided by the enigmatic AI, Vector, you'll delve into the fabric of existence, traversing ancient ruins and future realms. Every playthrough brings new challenges, insights, and hidden truths. Dare to redefine your reality?

name: Xanthiom 2
description: Play through the next chapter in the Xanthiom saga, now bigger and better than before!

name: Young Team Sounds
description: Break the dead ends! A music creation adventure where the sounds you create change depending on your "emotional choices". A dark tale of creation, modelled on the real world and real events.

name: Historia Realis: Rome
description: Be a Roman in this drama-filled grand strategy game with a focus on historical realism. Run for political office, fight in the legions, get married and educate your heir. Deal with rivals through violence, favors or intrigue while thousands of other characters live their own triumphs and tragedies.

name: Shipwrecked
description: Shipwrecked on a uncharted island, master survival alone or with friends. Battle, build, and conquer foes as you confront the mysteries lurking in its shadows.

name: Logistic Master
description: Logistic Master is a real-time economic strategy in which you have to lead a logistics company. Connect cities, build warehouses, buy transport, transport various goods. Relax and have fun!

name: Dataminers
description: Dataminers is a fast turn-based roguelike where you climb and clear highly secured towers full of data. Outsmart guards and hack terminals in this unique combination of strategy, stealth and Minesweeper.

name: Horrors of Helmsfirth
description: Horrors of Helmsfirth is a horror/adventure visual novel where you investigate the mystery causing townsfolk to disappear at night. Build trust with allies who can help save your town from monsters. Explore 9 different character plot lines and defeat the forces of evil‚Ä¶ or join them?

The cupid has to keep the smiley always happy by collecting the hearts. All you need to do is to move it by drawing various shapes to reach the hearts.
Sounds easy right, but trust us; it‚Äôs not as easy as it sounds. The game starts out casually, but as you play it, you'll discover it to be extremely perplexing and at the same time you‚Äôll want it even more!
The better you get, the harder the levels become and you never know, you may luckily find out a very convenient and easy way through some of the most brain rattling levels.

A-2481 - the horror game is one of the few games that really make you scared.
Have you ever thought about possibility to control human brain at a distance? Can we do that? The same ideas occupied our hero‚Äôs mind. A journalist of a small provincial newspaper finds fragments of information about a secret military bunker of the USSR times codenamed ¬´–ê-2184¬ª where such experiments were obviously carried out in strict secrecy. Without a moment's hesitation you decide to start searching for answers for your new article!
Dark and gloomy corridors of the bunker are a real thrill. And forsaken rooms where it seems people worked not so long ago, are terrifying. Every minute of stay in this evil place will make you go away as soon as possible. What is waiting for you there? Let‚Äôs find out!

Fit the glowing pieces to make full horizontal lines in order to disappear. Use the ghost guide on the bottom to fit certain pieces, and swipe it down to lock it in. Act quickly, because if you don‚Äôt do your job fast enough, extra curveballs will be thrown your way as you try to avoid letting your lines reach the top!

name: Am I AI
description:
Am I AI - Image Trivia Game is an exciting and addictive game that puts your visual intelligence to the test! Set to challenge players' perceptions, AM I AI is an innovative picture trivia quiz game that invites players to distinguish between AI-generated images and real images created by photographers, illustrators and designers.
Each level presents you with two similar images, one created by AI and the other real. The challenge is to identify which image has been generated by AI correctly.
With different of categories to choose from, including faces, landscapes, and more, the game offers variety and multiple levels of difficulty, for the most keen of eyes.
Immerse yourself in stunning visuals as you explore captivating images and uncover the secrets of AI-generated artwork. Train your eye to spot the subtle differences and nuances that distinguish real photos from AI-generated ones.
Engage in a captivating journey of discovery, where each correct guess brings you closer to unlocking new categories and conquering higher levels. Sharpen your visual acuity and become a master at deciphering AI-generated content.

name: Quadraticus HD
description:
This game features a unique gameplay included 63 different levels. In the game you will collect the image using the shape (similar to that used in tetris), which are limited to moving only one axis. Playing in Quadraticus you will be a serious mental work and you spend a lot of time trying to collect a puzzle.
To pass each stage you need to reconstruct the given puzzle image using the provided pieces. You can always see the image using hint.
Each piece can only move vertically or horizontally, and this is shown in the upper left and right squares of the board while you are touching a piece.
The board can be rotated by using the buttons in the lower left and right or with the accelerometer.

name: Puzzle Grid
description:
Puzzle Grid features over 1000 brainteasing puzzles over 4 game types and 100's of unique pieces!
4 games and over 1000 levels will keep you entertained for hours. Relax with easy levels or challenge yourself with mind boggling challenging levels.
Train your brain with these fun puzzles using logic, pattern matching and a little perseverance!

name: Piske & Usagi's Short Trip
description:
The game is so easy! Just send Piske the Usagi on a trip and wait for them to come back. Even those who don't usually play games can enjoy this simple casual idle game without any worries.
Where will they go and what souvenirs will they bring back!?
There are over 200 locations they can visit, including special seasons and locations.
There are also over 200 souvenirs including local delicacies. Make sure to get them all!
You can redecorate their house with different furniture and the souvenirs they bring back!

name: Bit Heroes Runner
description:
Bit Heroes Runner: Pixel Blitz takes pixel games on the run with an action-packed scroller that will leave you out of breath!
Escape the ferocious boss of each zone with all your loot and limbs intact and grow your 8 Bit Hero in the next installment of the Kongregate Bitverse.
Collect coins and power-ups to give your personalized 8 Bit Hero the boost they need to race over obstacles and cross the finish line to safety.
Turn your mistakes into valuable XP and watch your hero grow fast as you complete goals and unlock unique levels based on nostalgic pixel graphics.

name: Bloom

Bloom is a new free casual puzzle about chain reactions and a puppy with a bizarre love for berries. Follow Arya and her dog Bo in an adventure set in vibrant locations and a cute story with witty characters across hundreds of mind bending logic puzzles.
Done saving the world?
Enjoy an endless catalog of free levels created by players like you or try the ultra simple level maker to create your own level and share it with your friends! Show off your creativity and become the best creator in the world!

description:
Defend your train against the oncoming horde of AI controlled robots which run, fly, rocket and roll in pursuit.
Enemies are fully destructible and physically simulated (not animated) making for infinite variation in the carnage which you unleash.
Neural network control allows for a wide variety of enemies which attempt to maintain the chase even when their parts have been damaged and destroyed.
A variety of weapons and power-ups to unlock.
Game Center enabled with achievements to unlock and scores to share.

description:
Chrono Resurrection is an unreleased fangame developed by Resurrection Games under Nathan Lazur's direction, based on the Super NES role-playing game Chrono Trigger. The project was initially called CT64 and was meant to be a complete remake of the original game for the Nintendo 64 with both 2D and 3D playing modes, but it was eventually reworked from scratch.

On September 6, 2004, the project was publicly closed after Resurrection Games received a cease-and-desist letter from Square Enix for trademark and copyright infringement.

This sokoban/multiban adventure puzzle game is set in science fiction world of the Overseer Corporation Gaming Centre.

description: Immerse yourself in a dark, epic war between the Legion of Agony and the Infernal Guardians, where the quest for the mysterious Soul Stone tears apart the realms. Choose your side and get ready for an unforgiving battle to establish your dominance over a world in turmoil.

name: Sixtar Gate: Startrail - Luminous & Darkness Pack
description: Meet „ÄåLuminous & Darkness„Äç: The DLC which consists of winning songs from the composition contest 'Sixtar Planet'! This DLC contains 8 new songs and a new original theme.

name: ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival
description: Survive the undead onslaught! Customize your katana, team up or go solo. Hack through zombies, master combat, and dominate the leaderboards in ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival.

name: The Clubies
description: The Clubies is a party platformer where players navigate cute cube characters through the disco to reach the dancefloor! Encounter various hazards, puzzles, and shortcuts in a fun, colorful environment as you master user-built levels together.

name: The Demon King takes Revenge! Card Battle!!
description: Card battle game! The story is about the main character, the weakest Demon King, who battles rival magical girls, angels, and the Demon King of Hell, and grows up trying to subdue them. If you win, you can acquire your opponent's cards and incorporate them into your own deck.

name: The Demon's Lust

description: Decorate your weapon collection with these unique cosmetics inspired by the New England Mountains hunting reserve.

description: "Tune My Car - Tuning Studio & Car Mechanic Simulator 2023" is an exciting game where you become a master of car tuning. Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of automotive customization and unleash your creative energy by transforming ordinary cars into unique works of art on wheels.

name: Traffic Tour
description: Chill and simple car driving game.

name: Tyrant's Twilight
description: In a fantasy world where the chosen one is dead, forge a new hope for humanity. Command allies across the battlefield in turn-based tactical gameplay, but be prepared to get your hands dirty in over-the-shoulder combat as you slash, shoot, pierce and cast spells at your foes in real time action.

name: Underwater World: DLC Pack
description: The DLC Pack is an extension to Underwater World - Idle Desktop Colony Building Simulator. Includes additional content.

name: Yaz
description: Sword'n'sandal tops-down hack'n'slash-em-up

name: Numerology of Artifacts
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Dragon Fantasy
description: A turn based RPG game! Players will use the traditional RPG game mode to play two major scripts and three additional content. Players will follow the plot to encounter various events, defeat various bosses, explore different worlds, and welcome friends who love traditional RPGs to play!

name: God's Miniature Garden
description: "God's Miniature Garden" is a horror game where you can freely explore a residential area at night, both indoors and outdoors, and aim to capture each location. Find out what the heck is going on in this area!

name: Owari no Kane ga Naru mae ni: Chapter 2
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Narco Wars
description: The classic drug economy game is back! You're a dealer in 1990s New York with one goal: get as rich as possible in one month. Cocaine, LSD, weed, whatever's hot. Buy low and sell high for huge profits. Stay on top of market trends with your beeper. Run from the cops... or just gun them all down.

name: Rezzil Player: Forest Team Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the official Nottingham Forest FC Team Pack. Pick from a selection of exclusive kit from this historic club.

description: Hunt the enemy and strike from the shadows with an expanded cache of camouflage gear and a stealthy pistol at your side.

name: Super House of Dead Ninjas: True Ninja Pack
description: Now you can play as the fearsome One-Armed Ninja from the original House of Dead Ninjas, try your hand at the all new super hard "Ninja" Difficulty, AND refine your weapon skills with the dreaded Hookshot. Can you handle all this ninja goodness?

name: We Got Compagnie!
description: Ready your bow, tune your magical violin, and liberate the musical prodigies mangled by a Corrupted Melody by playing your own melody. Prepare yourself, 'cause We Got Compagnie!

name: Mr. Buttman's Grand Opening
description: Mr. Buttman was born with a fully functioning butt on his head. In fact, breathes through the butt, to the disgust of everyone around him. Despite his chronic bad breath, he's trying to start up his restaurant. His restaurant's grand opening is very soon. There's no time to waste!

name: Wildlife Wildfire
description: As Fleet Admiral, Your mission is to unite the animal factions against a cosmic threat! Wildlife Wildfire is a tactics game which adds innovative mechanics and seamless cross-platform play for you and your friends to enjoy on PC, Handheld and Mixed Reality!

name: Blobby's Quest
description: A simple, singleplayer 2D Platformer

name: Geometric Paradox TD
description: Geometric Paradox TD - a fast paced tower defense with minimalistic graphics but complex mechanics. Build towers, choose the correct upgrades, think fast and defeat those nasty shapes! Are you ready to use your strategic and creative thinking to stop the paradox?

name: Last Barrier
description: Last Barrier is a tower defense game set in a zombie apocalypse setting. Defend the base with army machine guns, rocket launchers and a wall built around the perimeter. Purchase unit upgrades with kill points. Your military base is the last line of defense against the countless forces of zombies.

name: Inumeda
description: Inumeda is the most nostalgic yet refreshing form of Turn Based RPG. For many, this experience will become an "intriguing mystery." Gather animal companions, Defeat enemies with skills triggered by their combinations, And explore this peculiar world.

name: The Police Interceptors Simulator: War Against Racers
description: You will become part of an elite police squad. Your mission is to engage in battles with unpredictable street racers who pose a danger to ordinary citizens on the roads. You will have to control various police vehicles and use your skills and tactics to apprehend and stop these dangerous offenders.

name: Dui
description: Help Dui find his way home in this challenging puzzle-adventure. Fight bosses, discover new abilities, and learn more about this quirky character on your journey home.

name: Crowd
description: Explore the depths of the pipes that once held better worlds, learn the life stories that are about to vanish in a world sinking in lies and conflicts. The tyranny rises in times of weakness.

name: Sword Drift
description: Fly with your sword, roam the martial arts world!

name: Baker Business 3: Halloween Pack
description: Invoke the Halloween spirit and invite autumn into your bakery. Bake spooky recipes, decorate your bakery for the season, hand out candy to your customers and spend tickets in the Halloween shop!

name: Touhou Dungeon Maker: The Labyrinth of Heart
description: Touhou Dungeon Maker is a roguelike x tower defense style dungeon management RPG. Strengthen characters, place multiple traps and facilities, and keep fighting off massive numbers of incoming phantoms. It's time to unravel the mysteries of the magical dungeon!

name: School Cafeteria Simulator
description: Manage your own Indonesian school cafeteria in this simple first-person simulation game!

name: The Leverage Game
description: You can learn realistic, world-class management techniques! The Leverage Game is an updated online version of ‚ÄúLeverage: The Game of Business,‚Äù an authentic business board game developed by ActionCoach 20 years ago.

name: Arcane Arena
description: Arcane Arena is an intense multiplayer action game chosen from diverse spellcasting classes, each with unique abilities. Engage in team-based combat, and dominate the battlefield. Unleash devastating spells, manipulate time, summon creatures, and harness elements to emerge victorious.

name: Lunar Ascendant
description: In Lunar Ascendant, a narrative-driven political simulation RPG, you lead Artemis, humanity's first lunar colony. You have to confront different factions in their struggle for power, and address the controversial use of human brains as CPUs. Your choices will shape the future of space colonization.

name: The First Explorers
description: The First Explorers is a Settlers-like game, that offers the perfect mix of organic city-building and RTS in a bustling world. Set in the time of antiquity in Europe, you will play as the Romans, Carthaginians or Gauls. Are you ready to raise an army backed by a thriving economy?

name: What the Hell
description: ÔªøWhat the Hell is a rogue-lite top-down shooter. A terrifying future awaits the modern world under the influence of demon lords. Choose varied features to create your own skill set and determine your gameplay style. Collect demon's souls and never stop until you become stronger than they are.

name: Isle of the J√∂tunn
description: You are the sole survivor of a terrible shipwreck. The isle is rich with the resources to keep you alive but, it seems there is another inhabitant. A Jotun of fearsome strength has lived here for ages and doesn't enjoy visitors.

name: War of Wheels
description: War of Wheels is a frenetic car fighting game in an original ‚Äúmedievalpunk‚Äù setting. Choose your car, inspired by a fantasy class, and get ready for battle! Play the single player campaign in the world of Zeranthia or challenge your friends in the numerous multiplayer modes. Fight!

name: Payday 2: McShay Mod Pack
description: McShay Mod Pack is available on its own or as part of the Hostile Takeover Bundle.

name: Fishing Planet: Topwater Kayak Pack
description: Tired of sitting with a fishing rod on the shore? Then Topwater Kayak Pack is what you need! It contains not only spinning and casting rods, powerful reels, wobblers, frogs, and many other surface lures, but also a branded kayak that will allow you to fish literally anywhere on the waterway!

name: Wild Terra 2: New Lands - Bard Pack

name: Just Cause 4: Neon Racer Pack
description: Grab the Neon Racer Pack and receive the modified Neon Racer Supercar, plus the Neon Racer Wingsuit and Neon Racer Parachute.

name: Rezzil Player: Rovers Team Pack
description: Upgrade your experience with the official Blackburn Rovers FC Team Pack. Pick from a selection of exclusive kit from this historic club.

name: Crisis Control
description: Crisis Control is a strategy game where you and up to 3 friends command firefighters, medics, police officers and technicans to protect a small, rapidly growing village from natural but also human-made desasters.

name: Ragdoll Combat
description: 3D ragdoll fighting game with local multiplayer support with a growing number of characters and weapons to be added though various different updates. Powered by Unreal Engine 5

name: Super Galaxy Ball: Skin Pack 1

name: Century: Skaarp Pack

name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All - Electro Blitz Pack

name: Animalia Survival: Haloween Pack

name: Space Dezinsector
description: Make your way through crowds of alien bugs using surrounding objects. Clear out the rubble and overcome the obstacles. Move through the corridors of the abandoned space station where you find yourself against your will.

name: Parry King

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Halloween Skin Pack

description: You're an NPC and the success of the game you live inside depends on you! As Aimee the blacksmith, it's up to you to give quests, craft weapons, make sales, assist with dangerous combat, and decorate the town as you work to keep the game‚Äîand your home‚Äîalive.
